articles.author: Liz Crampton
articles.title: After Trump’s remarks on Gaza, some in Dearborn, Michigan ‘think we screwed up.’ - POLITICO
articles.description: Trump’s plan to “take over” Gaza was met with outrage in Dearborn, Michigan, an Arab American enclave.
articles.content: After Trump made his comments, people in Dearborn are responding with extreme anger and disappointment with this president who lied to this community to steal some of their votes, said Osama Siblani,… [+5032 chars]
